title: Nap Time
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 24 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR40L
description: Many kids (and adults) enjoy taking naps! In Nap Time, readers will see detailed photographs of the different ways some animals nap. These adorable photographs, along with a repetitive text structure, will help early emergent readers feel confident in their reading. In addition to working on decoding skills, students will also have the opportunity to compare and contrast as well as connect to prior knowledge to better understand the text.
meta: bat, fish, giraffe, horse, lizard, naps
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast
Initial Sound : Discriminate initial consonant /n/ sound
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word a
